SwitchPreference.android:summary: Enables or disables automatic wifi scanning & joining

ListPreference.android:title: Required Difference
ListPreference.android:summary: The difference in signal strengths required for the wifi network to be switched

EditTextPreference.android:title: Scan Interval (display on)
EditTextPreference.android:summary: The time (in seconds) which we should scan for new networks to connect to when the display is on

EditTextPreference.android:title: Scan Interval (display off)

ListPreference.android:title: Notification Type
ListPreference.android:summary: The type of notification to receive when this app connects you to the best nearby network
